title: Michael Covel Interview on Trend Following Radio
itunes:title: Michael Covel Interview on Trend Following Radio
description:
Vitaliy recently sat down with his friend Michael Covel of Trend Following Radio. Michael and Vitaliy discuss investing in today's environment, luxury beliefs, energy, and tribalism in American society today.

The episode was recorded in January 2022, prior to the Russian invasion of Ukraine.

You can listen to the original interview in this link: https://www.trendfollowing.com/2022/02/13/ep-1050-vitaliy-katsenelson-interview-with-michael-covel-on-trend-following-radio/
